full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
=====================

**Reference Number:** WS3735581968-3735742713

**Solicitation Number:** WS3735581968

**Publication Date:** November 3, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM (MST)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Category:** Services (SRV)

**Class of Supplies/Services:** Restaurants and catering, Specialized accommodation services, Camping and wilderness facilities

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Location:** Alberta, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Nafissa Diop (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: [ None ]
* Fax: [ None ]


**Background:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Contractor to provide accommodations, onsite meals, and bagged meals for up to 36 people in support of the Advanced Mountain Operations (AMO) Course, from January 31 to March 11, 2023. The accommodations must be located no more than 40 km west of Nordegg town center.

**Scope of Work:**
The Contractor will provide:

* Accommodations for up to 36 people
* Onsite meals
* Bagged meals

**Timeline:**
The period of the Contract is from the date of Contract to March 31, 2023, inclusive.

**Request for Proposal:**
The RFP will be released on Ariba Discovery and Canada Buys. All required supporting documentation and the Bid submission must be submitted by December 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM (MST). Any Bid submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:**
This RFP is open to Canadian and international businesses under the following Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Attachments:**
For a copy of the RFP, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/145390
